New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest century in the history of the 50-overs World Cup
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 106 off 44 balls, David Warner made 104, and Australia scored 8-399
The Netherlands were bundled out for 90 in 21 overs, suffering the biggest defeat in the tournament's history
Miscellaneous Highlights: Travis Head was out due to a fractured hand, Mitchell Marsh retained his place as Warner's opening partner
Others: Bas de Leede conceded the most runs by a bowler in a men's ODI, giving away 115 runs in his 10 overs
